titles.title: DART Act of 2019
Data Analytics Robocall Technology Act of 2019
DART Act of 2019
Data Analytics Robocall Technology Act of 2019
DART Act of 2019
Data Analytics Robocall Technology Act of 2019
A bill to allow the Federal Communications Commission to carry out a pilot program under which voice service providers could block certain automated calls, and for other purposes.
DART Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

calendar.text: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

action.text: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Reported by Senator Wicker with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 116-292.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 585.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary:
Data Analytics Robocall Technology Act of 2019 or the DART Act of 2019
This bill allows the Federal Communications Commission to conduct a one-year pilot program enabling telephone companies to block automated calls they believe to be unlawful.
